head.p: Subject: discrimination against African Americans in the USA date: 08.12.2021

p.s: how are you?
I am doing great.
Maybe you are wondering why I am writing to you.
Here is why: Maybemaybe you know the novel The Hate U Give.
I read it in my English class and now I wonder whether racism is really a topical problem in the USA.
Then I found an articelarticle, which I find very interesting and want to share these informationinformations with you.
57 years ago president Lyndon B. Johnson declared the Civil Rights Act.
That means that in front of the law everyone has equal rights.
But out of the economical and social perspective black people have more difficulties.
And also the differences between black and white isare getting bigger by time.
Police violence is one fo the biggest differences.
Black men have a higher chance to get arrested than white men.
The police suspects black people way more too.
That is why the police inspects black people more often.
This is called stop-and-frisk.
One example for police violence is the shooting of Michael Brown.
7 years ago the 18 year old18-year-old African American Michael Brown got shot by a police officer.
This underlines the seperation of black and white even more.
Black people are also aat a great disadvantage when it comes to education.
Often black people can notcannot achieve their qualification and leave the school without one.
When they get the qualification they end their education carreercareer after High-Schoolhigh school or Collegecollege.
Although someof them get a good qualificataion they are more likely to stay unemployed.
That is why more than 25% of the black people live in poverty.
From the white people live only less than 10% in poverty.
Now I have a question for you.
Do you ever experiencedexperience racial injustice?
I would like to hear about that and maybe you can tell me your opinion on this articelarticle whether you think it is the truth or not.
I am looking forward to hearhearing from you.
